column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''40''' is the fortieth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.''' (Reproduces the manuscript page containing the poem 'Narqelion')<ref name=Books>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'', at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
* "Narqelion and the Lexicons: Some Notes on the Earliest Elvish Poem" — [[Christopher Gilson]].
**(Includes the text of the poem with extensive commentary.)<ref name=Books/>
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
*[http://www.tolkienindex.net/index/Category:Vinyar_Tengwar_40_Index Online index of names for ''Vinyar Tengar'' 40]
